Title: Skin Deep
Plot: House uncovers a startling secret when he treats a teenage supermodel for heroin addiction. Meanwhile, Wilson hopes the increased leg pain in House's leg is an indication his leg nerves are regenerating.
Writer: David Shore, Garrett Lerner, Russel Friend
GuestStars: Cameron Richardson, Tom Verica, Jim Hoffmaster, John Burke, Donzaleigh Abernathy, Karis Campbell, James DuMont
